OOC: Since I got here I've heard two things the Alliance is the strongest 
fraction and Zardus is almost impossible to beat. Well being mortal and 
teenage kid((and a Rookiee)) gives me chance to achieve the impossible.  
Also for those that think I'm crazy and have lectures for  me because I'm 
trying its better to try now than hiding behind the defense of the CF or 
cowering like a dog so save it for later. Since the Alliance is a legend 
right now this is the part of the game when legends fall. Since I'm out of 
lines there is only on thing left to say "Alliance are you ready for this? 
Also Zardus what do you want me to say when I gloat about my win "Zardus was 
beaten by Koj of the Silver Dragon or Zardus was lost in my hurricane of 
destuction" I'll give you time to think about this.As for the rest Wish me 
luck.

::Koj and Inu-Yasha for Eight hours review the study the plans reworking the 
attack tactics and the postion on the hologram layout of the Alliance 
base.::

::Koj::
Koj programs the transwarp cells and re-checks all the figures.

::Inu-Yasha::
Brings up 5 stasis pods with blank Protoforms in them and installs the 
transwarp cells.

::Koj::
Koj relaxs as he loads the pods with ????? then seals them so they only open 
from the outside.Then starts to study the data on the fighters in hopes of 
learning how to predict there actions and up his chance to counter.

::Inu-Yasha::
Recharges his breath weapons and adds some fire power to his body 2 chain 
pulse guns and a Missile launcher in his chest. Then goes to sit out on his 
perch watching the sun.

::Koj::
Koj goes to the center of the room drops to his knees and opens a small box 
that contains a White Lilly and meditates on the events to come and what 
Lilly told him for one hour. Then he reachs in the box takes out a metallic 
red ribbon and ties it around his forehead. Then goes and takes medical 
tapes up his knuckles and he adjust his body makeing sure all systems are 
go. "Feel the storm its coming!"
